item.title: Welcome!
item.description: This is the beginnings of my website’s migration back to Hugo to start up my blog again. Hugo is “the world’s fastest framework for building websites”, which is great because I often (mercilessly) rebuild pages over and over again, even after the tiniest of changes, to confirm that I like the way they look. If you don’t know yet, my name is Michael A. Agarenzo, and I am a Software Engineer.
